titles.step2: Tell us a bit about yourself

register.welcomeMessage: Welcome to the registration page for the InSPIRES Open Platform. Here you can create your own user to log into the site.
register.welcomeMessage2: Registering allows you to start contributing to the site! You can also register Intermediation Organizations and Research Projects to your or your Organization's name.
register.step1Message: Please write down your prefered user name and password. This user name is what you will use to login to the platform.
register.step2Message: Tell us your full name and email so it can be displayed along your projects and other activities in the platform. Your email will only be used for alerts and notifications.
register.step3Message: Before you can register, you will have to agree to our terms of service for the platform.
register.readTOSHere: You can read the terms of service here.
register.step3MessageAccepted: Great! we can continue with the rest of the registration.
register.step4Message: Please review the following information. If everything seems correct you can proceed with the registration.
register.step4MessageInvite: During the first period of testing, we are restricting the registration to those personally invited. Please enter the code provided to you below:

home.welcomeMessage: Welcome to the InSPIRES online database and impact evaluation tool. This platform features participatory research and innovation projects promoted knowledge intermediary units, such as Science Shops.

projectManage.hadPhase: This project was on this phase starting {date}.
projectManage.notHasPhase: This project has never been on this phase.
projectManage.deleteCollaborationAlert: Are you sure you want to cancel the collaboration?
projectManage.collaborationDeleted: Collaboration with structure has been withdrawn.
projectManage.participantsIntro: Add all the people helping to make this project possible here. Each person can have a role within the project. The Role will be used in determining what role they play in the impact evaluation tool.
projectManage.searchUsers: Collaboration with structure has been withdrawn.
projectManage.evaluationIntro: Add all the people helping to make this project possible here. Each person can have a role within the project. The Role will be used in determining what role they play in the impact evaluation tool.
